title: When will first yearites have ESA?
content: Isa 1 and isa 2 ends on 22 nov and 10jan respectfully. So esa will be in last week of jan or in feb? And any Holidays before sem 2 begins?

comments.body: mostly second last week of janðŸ’€
we get only 5 days break before esa starts?
where are u getting this information?
ESA dates will be mentioned in calendar of events. And we also got 5 days of holiday before our second Sem ESA as well
in academic caldenar only isa 1 and isa 2 dates are mentioned till end of jan 2025
Going by trend, ESA is usually a couple of days after ISA 2 and lasts 2 weeks.
Check your calendar. Usually ESAs is in the month of December or May depending on the semester.
